generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, typical of a street for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, bordered by trees and curbs, and also along the right side near parked cars.
- building: A building with a light-colored facade and windows is visible on the left side of the road, partially obscured by trees.
- fence: A dark fence runs along the left side of the road, separating the road from a property or garden area.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including one with a "No Parking" sign on the right and others supporting streetlights and signs.
- traffic sign: A "No Parking" sign (blue circle with a red diagonal line) is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves line both sides of the road, indicating a wooded or suburban area.
- terrain: Grass and fallen leaves are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalks, particularly on the right side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road, near the center of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are visible, including a black car approaching in the distance on the road, and several parked cars on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- rider: No rider (e.g., on a bicycle, motorcycle, or scooter) is visible in the image.
- traffic light: No traffic light is visible in the image.
